comments.en: Packs with special paper and three-color ribbon

Dye-sublimation photo printer in A4 size (8x12in/21x30cm). 314 dpi, full 24-bit color depth (256 levels per CMY color component), full-bleed (border-less). Produces laboratory-like photos. Does not print on normal paper, so it is not suitable for documents, it is only for photos. Parallel port and USB 1.1 connection.

Direct printing from Olympus cameras or from flash cards (of any DPOF-capable camera) possible. Photos on the cards can be shown and selected on an 1.8inch LCD monochrome display or on a TV set.
